mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id AS commentId, c.user_id AS userId, c.post_id AS postId, c.parent_comment_id AS parentCommentId, c.depth, c.comment_content AS content, c.is_deleted AS isDeleted, c.created_dt AS createdDt, c.updated_dt AS updatedDt, u.display_nickname AS displayUsername, u.user_profile_img_url AS userProfileImgUrl FROM comment_tb c LEFT JOIN user_tb u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY /* 부모 댓글 그룹별로 모으고, 그 안에서 댓글-답글 순서 및 시간순 정렬 */ IFNULL(c.parent_comment_id, c.comment_id) ASC, c.depth ASC, c.created_dt ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment_tb ( user_id, post_id, parent_comment_id, depth, comment_content, is_deleted, created_dt ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{postId}, #{parentCommentId}, #{depth}, #{content}, 0, NOW() )
